comment: two-step reaction (see R01074 + R05145) R05145 and R01074 are general reactions
definition: ATP + Biotin + Apo-[propionyl-CoA:carbon-dioxide ligase (ADP-forming)] <=> AMP + Diphosphate + [Propionyl-CoA:carbon-dioxide ligase (ADP-forming)]
name: Biotin:apo-[propionyl-CoA:carbon-dioxide ligase (ADP-forming)]
